overview:
If you have a need to encrypt and secure your internet connection—whether you’re using an unsecured public Wi-Fi connection or are worried about an authoritarian government snooping your data—a VPN service is used to overcome.

A PureVPN account provides you full anonymity by establishing an encrypted channel between your computer and a remote VPN server. As a result, no-one will be able to see the traffic and sites you are visiting.

PureVPN services changes your IP address assigned to the computer, which is useful when trying to access restricted servers and sites around the world specially the Geo-restricted TV channels like Netflix, Hulu, Pandora etc. They have existence in 18 countries and VPN servers on 50+ locations.

Customer support is comparatively responsive, they are 24/7 and easy to reach through their in-app customer support.

PureVPN for corporates:

Using PureVPN can have a major impact on a company too by increasing sales, product development can be accelerated, and strategic partnerships can be strengthened.

Prior to VPN, the only other options for creating this type of communication were expensive leased lines, Frame Relay or ATM access circuits. PureVPN corporate services features complete compatibility, easy setup, all PPTP, L2TP IPSEC and SSL/SSTP protocols and dedicated servers.
